CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 7, 1946, page 9, reads: "In Town - Mrs. Harry Black of Philadelphia spent this week in Pittsburgh visiting her sister-in-law, Mrs. Elestine Mitchell and Mrs. Daisy Lampkin. A member of an old Philadelphia family, Mrs. Black was entertained delightfully during her Smoky City stay. - Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Mrs. Black wearing eyeglasses with chain, dark long sleeved dress trimmed with fringe and diamond shaped brooch, holding open book, in domestic interior
